name: A Merchant's Journey
description:
Take on the role of a Merchant trying to make your way in the world. You will start without even a ship to sail on, trading wherever you can book passage to. Every city has a limited supply of goods, and some goods that are sold freely in one city are considered illicit contraband in another. 

Design and code by Charlie Krull 

https://charliek.itch.io/

Art and playtesting by Martha Mihich

https://itch.io/profile/mmartha
